tool_description: Use the way people type, on their keyboards, for authentication.
name: Typing Biometrics Authentication
title: Typing Biometrics Authentication

api_list.name: Check user
api_list.description: To check if a user exists and get the number of saved typing patterns. We recommend to save at least 2 typing patterns per user (170+ chars) in order to perform accurate authentications.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: A string of your choice that identifies the user
